meanings.sent1: The coffee was filtrating through the paper filter slowly.
meanings.sent2: She was filtrating the water to make it clean for drinking.
meanings.sent3: The naughty cat tried filtrating through the sieve but got stuck.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were filtrating through his mind like sand slipping through fingers.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight filtrating through the leaves created a beautiful pattern on the ground.

meanings.definition: To remove impurities by passing through a filter.
meanings.sent1: The chemist was filtrating the solution to separate the pure substance.
meanings.sent2: The air purifier was filtrating the air to remove dust particles.
meanings.sent3: The chef was filtrating the broth to get rid of any unwanted bits.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a filter, filtrating out any negativity around her.
meanings.sent5: The water filtrating through the rocks looked crystal clear and inviting.
